SALES

You can’t sell happiness, But we can sell a superyacht and that’s pretty much the same thing.

Sales

Our  solid experience  gained over years will offer a solution to any of the captain’s and owner’s needs. Whether you are interested in selling, buying or commissioning a new construction project, we are consistently on hand to support and guide you, offering our in-house knowledge to present you with the very best opportunities that the yachting market has to offer.
Learn more

Vessel Sales and Purchases

We offer advice to Clients both when they are selling their yacht or when they are acquiring a new yacht.

This includes providing advice on all the needed requirements to effect proper transfer of ownership with the Maltese or Cayman islands Registry.

We will assist you in drafting all necessary documents needed to transfer or purchase a yacht legally, acquire all documentation needed from the Authorities – both if you are the vendor or the purchaser – and we can also assist you in deducing whether the yacht you are about to purchase has any registered encumbrances.

Our  solid experience  gained over years will offer a solution to any of the broker, captain and owner needs.

  • Purchase or sell your yacht
  • Pre purchase surveyor
  • Legal and contractual services
  • New construction
  • Refits

Yacht Administration & Insurance

Administrative work with Flag / Shipping registries :

  • Yacht registration
  • Name changes
  • Ownership changes
  • Ownership structure

General support and assistance to captain, applying for cruising permits, booking agents and pilots, assistance with customs. Deal with all crew medical and vessel insurance claims Liaisons with insurers and appointing surveyors if required Possibility to offer comparative quotations

We are looking forward to the opportunity to connect with you and meet all your future requirements.
